articles.description: Hansi Flick decided to deliberately break FIFA rules in the build-up to Germany's 1-1 draw against Spain at the World Cup on Sunday - and his country are now facing the consequences
articles.content:
Germany are being investigated by FIFA after manager Hansi Flick defied World Cup rules in the build-up to their crucial draw against Spain. 
 Flicks side are still alive in the tournament after the… [+2677 chars]

articles.title: 2022/23 Cazoo World Darts Championship draw - PDC.tv
articles.description: Peter Wright will begin his defence of the Cazoo World Darts Championship against either Mickey Mansell or Ben Robb, after the draw for the sport's showpiece event was made on Monday.

articles.title: World Cup 2022: Aboubakar stunner and Ghana joy light up 'wild' Monday in Qatar - BBC
articles.description: Cameroon and Serbia's thrilling draw and Ghana's frenetic win over South Korea combine to deliver the most entertaining day of the 2022 World Cup so far.
